dialogue.introduction: I, Nagato, still won't lose to newcomers.
dialogue.library_intro: Born as the first battleship of the 8-8 fleet programme, the nameship of the Nagato-class battleships, Nagato. Until Yamato was commissioned, I served as the flagship of the Combined Fleet. I was called one of the 'Big 7'.
dialogue.secretary2: Is there something on my face?
dialogue.secretary3: W-wha, n-no, I-I... don't hate it.
dialogue.secretaryidle: Hm? What? It's not like I have much time on my hands. Ah yes, I am so busy...
dialogue.secretarymarried: It's alright.... I'm here with you.
dialogue.wedding: What is it I wonder? What is that landscape, deep inside my memories? Friendly and enemy ships, and then that intense light... Hey, Admiral...I must be stressed out.
dialogue.equipment1: My thanks. Now I can fight with them.
dialogue.equipment2: Modernization? I don't require such things though...
dialogue.supply: Yes. I should eat when I can.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: I'd prefer to enter the decisive battle in perfect condition.
dialogue.docking_complete: The repaired ship, can now return to the line of battle.
dialogue.ship_construction: It seems our new comrade has been launched. I'm looking forward to seeing her.ã€€
dialogue.return_from_sortie: Mission complete. The fleet has returned.
dialogue.battle_start: Don't underestimate the power of the Big Seven.
dialogue.attack: The long-awaited decisive battle, huh. I'm getting all excited.
dialogue.night_battle: Alright! Fleet, I, Nagato, shall lead the way!
dialogue.night_attack: All main cannons, full salvo! Fiiiiire!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: All main cannons, full salvo! Fiiiiire!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: All main cannons, full salvo! Fiiiiire!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: All main cannons, full salvo! Fiiiiire!
dialogue.mvp: It is insignificant compared to the honour of being the combined fleet's flagship, but... I'll accept it.
dialogue.minor_damaged2: The Nagato-class' armour is not just for show.
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Damn...The enemy fleet is pretty good...
dialogue.sunk: To sink in battle... not in that flash... is what I yearned for...
dialogue.new_year_2015: It's a happy new year, huh... I'm getting excited.
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: Mutsu...What is it? An umbrella? Ah, thank you. Rain of the Rainy season... Well, it is not bad to have a calm day like this every once in awhile.
dialogue.early_summer_2015: Okay, it's summer! All fleets, gather on the beach in swimwear! We shall practice Beach Volleyball! I, Nagato, will think up the divisions for the teams!
dialogue.christmas_2015: Admiral, you've been working hard. Let's drink together today.
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: t's already the end of the year huh... One year passed so fast. Hm? What is it Mutsu? Eh... Cleaning? I'm participating too? Ah, it can't be helped then. I'll clean the crevices.
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Setsubun, huh... I don't mind being the demon. Rather, this is not a horn! Ah, hey! The destroyers are already throwing it at me. I guess I have no choice... ROAAARR!!
